title: BlackRock Cuts Value of Private Debt Fund by 19%, Waives Fee
description: A BlackRock Inc. private debt fund expects to mark down the net value of its assets 19% after a string of troubled loans weighed on results, marking the latest sign of pressure in the private credit market.
content: A BlackRock Inc. private debt fund expects to mark down the net value of its assets 19% after a string of troubled loans weighed on results, marking the latest sign of pressure in the private credit market.
